document.full_text: the french voted on sunday in a second round of local elections that have caused alarm and disarray in president nicolas sarkozy's party after the far-right national front surged in first-round voting.
document.title: french vote, far-right hopes to consolidate gains
lines_and_colors: the french voted on sunday in a second round of local elections that have caused alarm and disarray in president nicolas sarkozy's party after the far-right national front surged in first-round voting.
